description:
Keep your beach baby safe in the sun with this shorty sunsuit piece suit. The soft tricot knit fabric has a 30 UPF rating, blocking more than 95% of harsh UV rays.

  • Made from a soft polyester tricot fabric that resists chlorine and has a UPF 30 rating
  • Mock neck collar covers vulnerable area at back of neck
  • Raglan style long sleeves
  • Front zipper runs to waist
  • Flatlocked seams throughout for comfort
  • Inseam is 28cm (12mo)
name: MEC Shadow Sunsuit Shorty - Infants
